name: Path of Life (itch) (NewQuestGaming)
description:
Path of Life

In development

To be published Christmas 2022

Choose which side you will fight for.

The Light of Good or the Dark of Evil.

Fight on a quest to win the jewel. 

The item that will determine who will rule all three realms.

Gameplay Features include:

  • Mouse/Game Controller support
  • Sideview battle
  • World Map
  • Mini maps
  • Character Selection (18 Choices) + good or evil
  • Side Quests
  • Difficulty Selection
  • Crafting
  • Equipment slot system like the Final Fantasy Materia system
  • Teleport system
  • Mini Games
  • Monster compendium
  • Stat distribution
  • Equipment Sets
  • Multiple Equipment Slots
  • System Options
  • Custom Combat graphics
  • 10 pages of credits for scripts, audio and graphics. A lot of work!
  • Currently using 485 script slots in the game = ~300 individual scripts
